description: Master CIMA E2 covering Strategy, HR, and Project Management

slides.title: Welcome to CIMA E2
slides.content:
# E2 - Managing Performance

E2 covers **strategy**, **people**, and **projects**.

## What You Will Learn

- **Strategy** - Planning and implementation
- **Structure** - Organization design
- **People** - HR management
- **Projects** - Change management

## Syllabus Areas

| Area | Weight |
|------|--------|
| Strategic planning | 30% |
| Organizational structure | 25% |
| Managing people | 25% |
| Projects and change | 20% |

slides.title: Strategic Planning
slides.content:
# Strategy Process

## Rational Model

```
Mission/Vision

    v

Implementation
```

slides.title: Change Management
slides.content:
# Managing Change

## Lewin's Model

```
Unfreeze -> Change -> Refreeze
```

## Kotter's 8 Steps

| Phase | Steps |
|-------|-------|
| Create climate | Urgency, coalition, vision |
| Engage | Communicate, empower, wins |
| Implement | Build, anchor |

## Resistance

- Fear of unknown
- Loss of control
- Self-interest
